title: UK's ultra-rich feel the pinch from Labour's tax-raising budget
content: Britain's wealthy are feeling the pinch following a slew of targeted tax hikes in the Labour government's budget, with many saying they are making good on plans to leave.
summary: Britain's wealthy are feeling the pinch following a slew of targeted tax hikes in the Labour government's budget, with many saying they are making good on plans to leave.

title: These countries have the most at stake as the U.S. heads to the polls
content: The world is watching the presidential election as voters go to the polls Tuesday, but the vote is more consequential for some countries than for others.
summary: The world is watching the presidential election as voters go to the polls Tuesday, but the vote is more consequential for some countries than for others.

title: Solid-state batteries may yet catch up — but silicon anodes are winning the race to power EVs
content: Silicon anodes appear to be leading the way in the race to commercialize next-generation battery technologies for electric vehicles.
summary: Silicon anodes appear to be leading the way in the race to commercialize next-generation battery technologies for electric vehicles.

title: The U.S. election is a make-or-break moment for aid to Ukraine
content: Ukrainian officials are likely watching U.S. polls with more than a touch of nervousness this week, as the vote remains too close to call.
summary: Ukrainian officials are likely watching U.S. polls with more than a touch of nervousness this week, as the vote remains too close to call.

title: Coinbase's big election bet is about to be tested
content: Coinbase emerged as a top corporate donor this election cycle, backing candidates the company viewed as supporting its pro-crypto agenga.
summary: Coinbase emerged as a top corporate donor this election cycle, backing candidates the company viewed as supporting its pro-crypto agenga.

title: British regulator says $19.5 billion Vodafone-Three merger could go ahead if remedies are adopted
content: Telecom firms Vodafone and Three's multibillion-pound merger could go ahead if the companies adopt proposed remedies from the U.K. competition regulator.
summary: Telecom firms Vodafone and Three's multibillion-pound merger could go ahead if the companies adopt proposed remedies from the U.K. competition regulator.

title: Is this the world's 'coolest hotel room' for baseball fans? Go inside to see the view
content: Travelers who stay at the hotel inside the Es Con Field Hokkaido stadium can watch baseball games from their rooms or while soaking in natural hot springs.
summary: Travelers who stay at the hotel inside the Es Con Field Hokkaido stadium can watch baseball games from their rooms or while soaking in natural hot springs.

title: Foreign buyers eye Japan's empty houses with millions available for cheap — but experts warn of risks
content: While many places in the world face a housing shortage, Japan is facing the opposite problem: An oversupply of homes on the market.
summary: While many places in the world face a housing shortage, Japan is facing the opposite problem: An oversupply of homes on the market.

title: Move over Black Friday: Consumer interest in 'Travel Tuesday' soars
content: Search interest for "Travel Tuesday" rose more than 500% over the last two years, according to a report published Thursday by McKinsey & Company.
summary: Search interest for "Travel Tuesday" rose more than 500% over the last two years, according to a report published Thursday by McKinsey & Company.

title: Nintendo profit plunges 69% as it cuts forecast for sales of ageing Switch console
content: Investors are waiting for news surrounding a successor to the Switch which they hope will re-energize Nintendo's gaming business.
summary: Investors are waiting for news surrounding a successor to the Switch which they hope will re-energize Nintendo's gaming business.

title: Burger King parent Restaurant Brands falls short of third-quarter expectations
content: Net sales climbed 24.7%, largely thanks to the company's acquisitions of its largest U.S. Burger King franchisee and its Popeyes business in China.
summary: Net sales climbed 24.7%, largely thanks to the company's acquisitions of its largest U.S. Burger King franchisee and its Popeyes business in China.

title: Oil giant Saudi Aramco posts 15% drop in third-quarter profit but maintains dividend
content: Lower global oil prices, weaker demand and prolonged OPEC+ production cuts led by Saudi Arabia continue to impact crude prices.
summary: Lower global oil prices, weaker demand and prolonged OPEC+ production cuts led by Saudi Arabia continue to impact crude prices.

title: As China approaches WTO, analysts say Beijing-EU tariff spat unlikely to go 'too far'
content: China's commerce ministry said Monday that it had filed an additional appeal with the WTO over the EU's tariffs on its EVs, as bilateral talks have yet to lead to a breakthrough.
summary: China's commerce ministry said Monday that it had filed an additional appeal with the WTO over the EU's tariffs on its EVs, as bilateral talks have yet to lead to a breakthrough.

title: What the stock market typically does after the U.S. election, according to history
content: Stocks typically rise after a presidential election, but investors need to be prepared for some short-term choppiness first, history shows.
summary: Stocks typically rise after a presidential election, but investors need to be prepared for some short-term choppiness first, history shows.

title: Germany's government is on the brink of collapse — here’s what could happen now

title: Labor strikes shut down operations at Canada's container ports from East to West Coast, with U.S. trade left in limbo

title: Berkshire Hathaway's cash fortress tops $300 billion as Buffett sells more stock, freezes buybacks
